Synonym: external medulary lamina of lentiform nucleus
lateral medulary lamina of globus pallidus
external medulary lamina of globus pallidus
Lateral medullary lamina.Definition: Thin band of myelinated fibers lying on the lateral (external) surface of the globus pallidus, external segment, separating it from the putamen.  (Carpenter, A core text of neuroanatomy, 3rd ed., 1985, pg 303).
